title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the File Type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed.
EB: The file is now saved as a generic file without any file extension, and when opened, it is treated as plain text.
SR:
1) Open an existing Java file. 
2) Make modifications to the file, for example, by moving a class.
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon. A dialog box will appear.
4) Browse for a valid location to save the file.
5) Type the filename without including the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok. 

After performing these steps, observe that the file is added to the Navigator in the specified location but without a file extension.
